typeDescription.name: AnswerAnno
typeDescription.description: A structure for each line that is an answer to a question

featureDescription.name: AnswerNumber
featureDescription.description: Indicates which number answer a particular AnswerAnno is

featureDescription.name: IsCorrectAnswer
featureDescription.description: Indicates whether a particular AnswerAnno is a correct (True) or incorrect (False) answer

typeDescription.name: QuestionAnno
typeDescription.description: A structure for each line that is a question

typeDescription.name: LineAnno
typeDescription.description: A structure for each line in an input .txt file, to be delineated by newline characters, of which subtypes are either QuestionAnno or AnswerAnno

featureDescription.name: LineNumber
featureDescription.description: Indicates which line number of the input .txt document a particular LineAnno is

typeDescription.name: DocumentAnno
typeDescription.description: Contains all the text from an input .txt file, from which LineAnno types are created

typeDescription.name: AnswerAnnoTokenized
typeDescription.description: Has the feature StringArray, which contains the tokens of the answer in question

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: A string array of the tokens of a given answer sentence

typeDescription.name: QuestionAnnoTokenized
typeDescription.description: Has the feature StringArray, which contains the tokens of the question in question

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: A string array of the tokens of a given question sentence

typeDescription.name: AnswerOneGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 1-grams of a given answer sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 1-grams of a given answer sentence

typeDescription.name: AnswerTwoGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 2-grams of a given answer sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 2-grams of a given answer sentence

typeDescription.name: AnswerThreeGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 3-grams of a given answer sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 3-grams of a given answer sentence

typeDescription.name: QuestionOneGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 1-grams of a given question sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 1-grams of a given question sentence

typeDescription.name: QuestionTwoGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 2-grams of a given question sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 2-grams of a given question sentence

typeDescription.name: QuestionThreeGrams
typeDescription.description: Contains in the feature StringArray the 3-grams of a given question sentence

featureDescription.name: StringArray
featureDescription.description: Contains the 3-grams of a given question sentence

typeDescription.name: AnswerScorer
typeDescription.description: Scores an answer using n-gram string arrays

featureDescription.name: Score
featureDescription.description: The score for a given answer sentence, output by the scorer type that assigns a score based on n-gram similarity between a question sentence and an answer sentence

typeDescription.name: Sorter
typeDescription.description: Sorts AnswerAnnos according to their scores, and calculates precision

featureDescription.name: SortedAnswers
featureDescription.description: A list of the SentenceAnnos, sorted by score

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of the sorted string list

featureDescription.name: ComponentName
featureDescription.description: The name of a component that produces the sorted string list

typeDescription.name: AnswerActual
typeDescription.description: Contains the sentence part of an AnswerAnno, the part which will be tokenized and turned into n-grams

typeDescription.name: QuestionActual
typeDescription.description: Contains the actual sentence part of a QuestionAnno, the part which will be tokenized and turned into n-grams

typeDescription.name: PrecisionCalculator
typeDescription.description: Contains feature PrecisionValue that represents precision at N

featureDescription.name: Precision
featureDescription.description: The value for precision over the AnswerAnnosâ€”out of all the answer sentences receiving a score (which should be all of them, right?), how many of the N correct answers (as obtained from the gold standard data given) are in the top N results after sorting?

featureDescription.name: ComponentName
featureDescription.description: The name of a component that produces the precision score

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence of the precision score

typeDescription.name: AnnoPlus
typeDescription.description: Contains features for "Confidence" and "ComponentName," which are features that the homework assignment informs us every annotation should have. So all annotation types in my structure inherit from this type.

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: The component's confidence score assigned to the annotation

featureDescription.name: ComponentName
featureDescription.description: The name of a component that produces the annotation
